Fight at the Movies stars a new map, the Holowood Drive-In, where the playing field changes in real-time as you brawl through scenes from movies across every genre. What’s a movie without snacks, though? Grab yourself a concession-stand classic with the all-new Soda Ball. Time your throws to cover your rivals’ screens with sticky soda!

Season 2 also brings a new season of League Play (with its own shiny rewards), tons of new cosmetics, new Playlists, and more. Arrive to matches in style in a shiny new stretch limo Crew Vehicle, unlockable in all-new weekly Crew Contracts.

name: Knockout City: Season 1 - Welcome to Knockout City
summary: Now grab a ball, round up a crew, hit the streets, and make a name for yourself!

name: Knights & Guns
summary: Inspired by the classics, developed for the modern audiences. A classic revenge story set in a medieval fantasy world… with a touch of deadly modern firepower just to turn things up to eleven. Fight through the armies of undead, mutants, aliens, machines and beasts in order to get back what is rightfully yours and bring some semblance of peace back to the land. Who knows - if you’re thorough enough you might even discover the history of the kingdom itself, long lost to the scholars of the realm. Knights & Guns brings you to a dangerous world where you will fight, alongside your friend, against demons, ghouls & ghosts. Use shotguns, lasers and the power of chivalry to overcome every obstacle. Become the best version of a knight - one with a gun.

name: Knights and Dungeons
summary: Knights and Dungeons is a single player game inspired by games like Clicker Heroes and other clickers.Knights and Dungeons is a clicker Idler game where your main goal is to defeat the enemies in the dungeon.and try to beat most levels as possible.

name: Knockdown the Ball Twice
summary: Meet the most annoying ball rolling game!

name: Knight of the Lions
summary: Help a teenage girl named Vita collect pieces of the world that has shattered around her, get her feet back on the ground and realize that being a knight is not about wearing a suit of armor.

name: Knightmare
summary: Use a unique chess-based move set to travel through the Dream Realm and prevent a mysterious amulet from falling into the wrong hands.

name: Knight's Edge
summary: Choose your weapon and take to the field in Knight’s Edge! Slay the monsters with your team, racing to see who will come out on top.

name: Knockout City: Deluxe Block Party Edition
summary: Team up and duke it out with rival Crews in Knockout City—in Deluxe Edition style!

name: Knockout City: Block Party Edition
summary: Team up and duke it out with rival Crews in Knockout City during the limited-time Block Party event for exclusive rewards! Brawl on every map, with every ball, in every style, through every playlist of Season 1.

name: Knight and Princess
summary: The legend says "Only the most skillful players can beat the dragon" so I challenge you, are you the true Knight?Take up the challenge and save the Princess.

name: Knightly Passions
summary: These are the escapades of a young hunter seeking his missing sister. Adventure awaits you in a medieval fantasy world filled with bloodthirsty monsters and deadly traps. You’ll make new friends, experience powerful temptations while meeting gorgeous girls, undergo every trial, and vanquish evil!

name: Knight of Exile
summary: Prepare your weapons and head to battle, Knight of Exile is a 2D action platformer with hack-n-slash combat where you will embark on a journey of revenge and redemption to liberate the kingdom of Olmur.

name: Knights of Pen and Paper: Haunted Fall
summary: Knights of Pen & Paper: Haunted Fall expands on the unmistakable charm and wit of the original game with more enemies, more epic quest and more locations in a spine tingling Halloween setting.Navigate an engrossing new quest line where you square off against unruly Jack o Lanterns, wobbly undead and a mish mash of bewildered monsters.

name: Knuckers Test Fight
summary: Knuckers Test Fight is a couch fighting game with funny characters, cute costumes, various weapons, tricky levels, and mini-games.

name: Knockout League: Heavy Bag
summary: Introducing the newest Knockout League training game, the Heavy Bag! In this new training game, you will target different areas on the Heavy Bag with vicious combinations of punches as Doug tests your accuracy, speed, power, and endurance. Keep your workout towel handy, you’ll be working up a sweat!

name: Knell of St. Godhrkar
summary: In this game, you can watch as 7 protagonists come to a crossroad, facing their own destiny. You will witness their own choices and the blood-splattering consequence they have on one another. There is no way out except to plunge them into the abyss...

name: Knights of Grumthorr 2
summary: Real-time strategy and tactics in a fantasy world of knights and magic! Command heroes, soldiers and mages to battle against the armies of darkness. Grumthorr needs you!

name: Knights of San Francisco
summary: Explore what remains of the ancient city of San Francisco and experience dynamic combat in this RPG text game. What if goblins, ogres, and dragons weren't imagined? What if our ancestors were, unwittingly, foretelling the future? Find yourself in that future, centuries from now, among the ruins of what was once the 21st century – where these terrifying creatures roam freely… Heavily inspired by modern tabletop RPGs, this game puts you in the shoes of a young necromancer on a quest. Battle monsters, raise the dead, and explore what remains of the ancient city of San Francisco.

name: Knights vs Knightesses
summary: Knights vs Knightesses is a fun, real-time action battle game for two players. Played on a single shared iPad, you and your friend play a female or male medieval army and try to conquer the opposing village. Strategic placement of soldiers like the Knight and Knightess, Berserker, Wizard, Archer and Unibird will be crucial to your win -- as will be a quick tapping finger to perform your battle attacks! Just put your finger on the action icon when it appears over your warriors, and you'll be able to trigger sword slashes, arrow shots, magic attacks, hold up a shield, or roll the drum to motivate your team. But keep your cool, or the opposing gender will enter your village, and then it's "Makra'r Bakk" for you.

name: Knight Maker
summary:
A novice blacksmith and a novice Swordstress pairs up for a successful business!
You, a novice blacksmith, suddenly have to take over you uncle's smithy.
With the help of the PR Swordstress he hired for the Smithy's publicity,
Run the Smithy with materials gathered from hunting grounds
And craft stronger equipments to challenge even more dangerous hunting grounds.
You and the Swordstress will have to work together
To make a successful business together as a team!

name: Knight Game
summary: Medieval local multiplayer battle arena

name: Knights of Saturn
summary: Microgravity sword thrusting simulator

name: Knock Knock Traveling soulsman
summary: Try to keep your job as a door to door soulsman.

name: Knights of the Tiny Table
summary: Help King Arthur and his Knights defend the realm. Slay the evil entities with a combination of lucky dice rolls and clever tactics.

name: Knightmare Treasure
summary: KnightMare Treasure RPG Game is a Roguelike all about exploring constantly changing dungeons, filled with a variety of different enemies and treasures to find. Equipped with an arsenal of weapons.

name: Knockball Pool
summary: Play against yourself or the computer in this physics-based billiards hit!

name: Knockout City: Season 4 - Alien Invaders
summary: Take me to your crew leader! Reports are coming in all over the city. UFO sightings in the skies. Increased military presence on the ground. Smoke rising from Overland Farms. Aliens are invading Knockout City!

name: Knockout City: Season 3 - H@cked
summary: Season 3 is here! Speaking of, it’s a little… different out there. Seems like the DJ isn’t the only one who’s been paying attention to what’s going on in Knockout City—looks like we got an extra visitor here with us. Keeps poppin’ in and lookin’ around, calls themself Zer0. Not sure how they got here, but pretty sure it’s got something to do with this Season’s theme. They’ve taken over the airwaves and it sounds like they’re here to stay.

name: Knightin'
summary: Knightin' is a little zelda-like adventure. Explore dungeon, fight monsters and solve puzzles.

name: Knights and Castles
summary: IDLE GAME

name: Knight 24/7
summary: Pixel Knight Hero

name: Knights of the Holy Loop
summary:
A rogue-like adventure game about fellow guys stuck in a cursed loop!

Build your team and change their position to create interesting combos. Know your enemies and prepare wisely, or your journey is not going to last long...

Every runs are different, everything is generated procedurally.

name: Knights of the Round Torus
summary: Meteor launching team building arcade action! Clear the roads and defend the citizens of a magical torus for as long as you can.

name: Knight's Try
summary: Knight's Try is a tough platformer with retro 64 bit 3D graphics. Take on the role of an honorable Knight of Trye attempting to complete their sacred pilgrimage by leaping through a world full of perilous pitfalls and dangerous traps!

name: Knight Riot
summary: Knight Riot - 2d Slasher with a side view, the player uses the cursor to control the direction of the strike and cuts the enemies who are on the attack line.

name: Knight Jones and Dragons Fall
summary: Protect innocent people from evil dragons as the most noble and humble of all knights. Uncover the treacherous deception and save the Kingdom (optionally you can marry the prince/princess afterwards).

name: Knightlife
summary: Four villages in a war. You are the only hope for a peaceful life. Play as a knight in this cute open world RPG and loot through many different weapons, magical spells and bows. Become the strongest knight and end this war.

name: Knight Runaway
summary: Knight Runaway is a platformer filled with various mechanisms and levels, each of which challenges the skills and nerves of the player.

name: Knight's Raid: Lost Skytopia
summary: Knight’s Raid: Lost Skytopia is a fantasy anime card game with generous benefits and innovative gameplays. Players will step into the Karlmoss, which is a world full of mysterious stories and undiscovered treasures.

name: Knight of the Living Dead
summary:
A precise platformer inspired by Legend of Zelda 2 and Jump King.
You are a returning knight from the past, now setting off to seek revenge for the kingdom. But many years have passed, and you are now unfamiliar with the changed world.

name: Knightblade
summary: A retro open world RPG, farming sim, and dungeon crawler. Knightblade is best described as an open world fantasy game mixed with farming and life sim elements, as if it were made in the golden age of video games. Create your character, and explore the sandbox while solving a mystery.

name: Knightfall: A Daring Journey
summary: Two knights, a strong bond, and a long journey. Take up the race for the rose, ride from village to village and take shelter before nightfall by any means necessary! If your bond is strong and your horse drifts well, you can be the recipient of the fabled rose. Luckily you brought guns!

name: ...Knew the Beginning
summary: A world you don't recognize anymore. You wake up inside a bar after the apocalypse. The barkeeper of said bar is in trouble. Do what you can to help him, after all he is all you remember.

name: Knights of the Chalice 2: Archmage Edition
Knight Crawlers
summary: Knight Crawlers is a dungeon crawling ARPG with physics based ragdoll combat. Each crawl is made unique through dozens of skill cards to choose from. Hunt for loot, craft powerful equipment, and fight your way back home through strange worlds. How deep can you crawl through the endless realms?

name: Knockout City: Season 5 - Greatest Hits
summary: We’re rolling into a non-stop block of all the chart-topping hits from Year 1 in Knockout City! There are no commercials and no fillers in Season 5: Greatest Hits! We’ve brought back five Playlists you know and love: one every two weeks! Plus, we scrambled up a twist on an old classic for the Mid-Season Event that’ll have you hopping wild. Each Limited-Time event will feature many of the cosmetics, Ultimate Holograms, Intro Poses and MVP Poses that you’ve been waiting for a chance to see in the Shop again, along with unique items that we’re releasing for the first time! There’s never been a better time to experience the best that this City has to offer!

name: Knotwords
summary:
Knotwords is a minimal and elegant logic puzzle — with words.

The rules are simple: arrange the letters in each section so every word is valid, across and down.

Each puzzle may seem difficult at first — but like all my favorite newspaper puzzles, it gets easier as you progress. Each step guides you naturally towards the solution.

name: Knuckles Soccer
summary:
Knuckles Soccer is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2003. There are two buttons on the game. McDonald's later released a similar Tails Soccer which uses Tails instead of Knuckles.

The objective of the game is to make Knuckles intercept the ball which are kicked down the screen by Eggman. Knuckles must protect the goal which is directly behind him. The ball can move erratically on screen at times so it's best to keep a close eye on the ball. Catching the ball 10 times will increase the level and speed. There are a total of five levels. If the ball is missed five times in a single level the game will end.

name: Knuckles Treasure Hunt
summary: Knuckles Treasure Hunt is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2004. | The objective of the game was to move Knuckles around with the two buttons to collect Chaos Emeralds. The level has six platforms that feature randomly appearing Chaos Emeralds. There are two moving platforms that take the player to higher or lower levels. After Knuckles accumulates a certain number of Chaos Emeralds the game ends.

name: Knuckles Baseball
summary:
Knuckles Baseball is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2004. Strangely this game seems to have not been released in all regions of the world and a totally different Knuckles themed game was released elsewhere.

The objective of the game is to catch baseballs thrown by Sonic. This is done by pressing the button at the correct time after the ball is thrown. If ten are caught the game will advance by 1 level and the speed of the game will increase.

name: Knights & Guns: Extended Edition
summary: Knights & Guns: Extended Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game and Expansion Pack #1 which adds 10 new levels, five new armors and new enemies for that extra little kick.

name: Knight Story
summary: Black and white 2D platformer about a knight's journey.

name: Knights of Fate
summary: The Triskelion Knights are an elite force selected and trained to protect the country. They're the King's right hand and they are now called to the biggest mission of their lives, to stop a Shaman from regaining his full powers and starting another war for the souls of the people.

name: Knights of the Exploding Table
summary: Knights of the Exploding Table is an explosive platformer that harkens unto the late 90's era of 3D games. Place, kick, lift, and throw bombs to navigate your way to the end of each stage. Collect gems to buy hats and unlock an extra stage. Challenge your friends to exhilarating Explosion Battles!

name: Knight and Mourning
summary: Knight And Mourning is a fast-paced, rage-inducing 2D platformer where you are on a mission to find your lost sword. Run, jump, dodge spikes, and suffer.

name: Knight of the Dead
summary: In Knight of the Dead, the apocalypse is upon us. To run from the inevitable horde, one must consider their moves wisely, lest time, and the undead, catch up to them.

name: Knights of the Deep
summary: Knights of the Deep is an online, action-packed arena fighting game with crustaceans. Choose your favorite brawler from the seas and duke it out against each other using a variety of weapons and special abilities. Each crustacean has a unique playstyle, learn them all and climb the hierarchy!

name: Knowledge Challenge
summary: This game helps you entertain after stressful working hours. We bring you quizzes on many topics such as: Books, Movies, Music... There are 3 levels of play for each topic. The puzzle database is updated regularly. We are still working to bring more game modes. Have fun!

name: Knights of the Kitchen Table
summary: Giant food monsters are attacking! As a Knight of the Kitchen Table, it is your sworn duty to defeat them in this action-adventure, hack-and-slash, souls-like game!

name: Knights of Decayden
summary:
Knights of Decayden is a rediscovered (July 2022) title, a long-lost exclusive release for the original Xbox. It was developed by the team behind a series of acclaimed Star Wars games and quietly canceled by Microsoft two decades ago.

Knights of Decayden (sometimes spelled as Decadyn) has been largely unknown to the public until now and helps highlight a hidden part of early Xbox history.

The game went by many names, including Knights of Utu, when it was pitched in 2000 to Sony as a PlayStation 2 game. Ultimately it became an Xbox exclusive until it's cancellation.

name: Knittens
summary: No cat likes to look dowdy, darling! Help felines look their best by mastering this match-3 puzzler that transforms yarn into stylish outfits.

name: Knight Solitaire 3
summary: Win a tournament, defeat a dragon… What other deed should a knight perform? Save a princess in Knight Solitaire 3!

name: Knight's Castle
summary: A fun collection of minigames that revolve around life in a medieval castle! This game is aimed at kids from ages 2 to 8.

name: Knights vs Nature
summary: Engage in epic battles against nature. In Poema's take on the classic tower defense style. Build and upgrade your towers. Grow your reputation with your favorite faction. Uncover and reclaim the world!

name: Knockout City: Season 6 - City of Tomorrow
summary: Look for Hideout updates, Boomerang Ball, League Play loss forgiveness, map changes, and numerous other updates!

name: Knockout City: Season 7 - Mutant Mutiny
summary:
Deep, deep, DEEP under the streets of Knockout City, a new kind of brawler is bubbling to the surface. What started as a rumor of glowing eyes, squishy footsteps, and muffled snarls from sewer grates is growing into a revolution of massive proportions. The Mutants are here, and they want justice.

It’s a new Season of Knockout City – a new day for brawlers everywhere to discover new cosmetics, battle it out in a new dodgebrawl map, and meet some legendary mutants along the way.

name: Know more Thai
summary: Different countries have different culture. When people "Know More Thai" is a full 3D 3rd person game to let its player learn about Thai etiquette and Customs. This game aims at supporting foreigners who plan to visit Thailand to learn about the rules, social believes, and Thai cultures.

name: Knight Lore Remake
summary: Knight Lore Remake for the MSX with graphical improvements.

name: Knight Lore
summary: Fan made game of Ultimate's classic Knight Lore.

name: Knights of Frontier Valley
summary: Knights of Frontier Valley is a highly replayable survival RPG where no two games are the same. Take on the role of an adventurer and guide him through his life in a unique and dynamic world. Gain fame and fortune, while never losing sight of the most important goal: staying alive!

name: Knighty
summary: Join the Royal Tournament! Knighty is a funny multiplayer party game with dozens of different knightly competitions waiting for you. Avoid obstacles, compete with others, make your way to the top and fight for the Knighty title. There can be only one winner!

name: Knights Crypt
summary: Knights Crypt is an action adventure RPG, embark on hundreds of quests, conquer your enemies and make a name for yourself throughout the kingdom. Employ ancient magic and train your combat abilities to restore peace throughout the lands of Altera damaged by the revolt of its people 50 years ago.

name: Knossu
summary: A non-euclidean horror game.

name: Knights & Guns: Expansion Pack #1
summary:
The village is under threat again, will you take up the challenge, Sir Gunsalot?
This DLC includes:
- 10 new levels for you to bring back the peace
- Five new armors to help you on your quest
- New enemies for that extra little kick

name: Knights and Craftsmen
summary:
Create your own story in Knights and Craftsmen. The lord can also obtain funds through the trade between the city-state, and gain prestige by completing the task. Through the ocean port, he can open up overseas colonies to obtain more territory and resources. Finally, a great and powerful city-state will be established.
You can also be the creator of a story.

name: Knights of the Zodiac: The Phoenix Returns
summary: Knights of the Zodiac: The Phoenix Returns is a fan game created for the Game Boy Color that retraces the beginning of the animation (from the moment where Seiya gets his armor) and follows the battle against Ikki.

name: Knock'Em Out
summary: Fight with your whole body. If you lose an arm, it's just a scratch. If you lose the other, it's a flesh wound. If you lose your legs, headbutt them. FIGHT, FIGHT, FIGHT!

name: Knights of Legends
summary: Classic turn-based strategy game!

name: KnifeBoy: Rebooted
summary: Things are going to start getting weird.

name: Knights & Guns: Expansion Pack #2
summary:
The village is under threat again, will you take up the challenge, Sir Gunsalot?

This includes: 10 new levels for you to bring back the peace, 5 new armor pieces to help you on your quest and ew enemies for that extra little kick.

name: Knockback Knockout
summary: Knockback Knockout is a 2D online party game for 2-6 players.

name: Knightcore Kingdom
summary: Knightcore Kingdom is a fast-paced strategy RPG that blends tactical deployment, tower offense, and hero collection. Players act as Lords of Camelot, leading Legions to reclaim lands after a cosmic disaster. With 99-second battles, real-time unit control, and a rich cast of heroes, the game offers casual yet strategic gameplay for mobile audiences

name: Knorrig the Gifted Troublemaker
summary: Who said having a pet piggie is a bad idea? Well, you did. Just now. It's 10 minutes before the festive dinner and you find yourself in a pickle thanks to your pet. Or should we say 'pigle'. The lovely gift for your sister is gone. Will you manage to get it back in time?

name: Knights & Guns: Expansion Packs Collection
summary:
It includes:
- Knights & Guns Expansion Pack #1
- Knights & Guns Expansion Pack #2

name: Knights & Guns: Premium Edition
summary: Knights & Guns: Premium Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game and Expansion Pack #2 which adds 10 new levels, five new armors and some new enemies.

name: Knights Beasts & Magic
summary: An evil force has swept into your land. Repel these beasts before all is lost. Upgrade your base, and unlock special units to clear 5 levels and claim victory!

name: Knights Beasts & Magic 2
summary: A Veil of Darkness is Shadowing your land. The beasts have taken your people by surprise. Their destruction was violent, merciless, and swift. The fate of your kind is under your command. You must engage these enemies in battle in every region of your kingdom. If you have the fortitude, cunning, and resilience to overcome these beasts you will be victorious. If not, the beasts wont rest until they have devoured all life here.

name: Knight Flight
summary: KNIGHT FLIGHT is a physics-based adventure game set in medieval times. Fling your heroes across the screen to smash obstacles, defeat enemies and solve puzzles. Can you solve all 30 levels and stand victorious in the final boss fight?

name: Knights of Dice
summary: Knights of Dice is a dice-rolling game, which aims to please gamers that are into boardgames, turnbased games, strategy, and a sprinkle of party-RPG and rougelite.

name: Knocking Up My Nympho Neighbors
summary: Take care of the residents of a dormitory for hard working women, who need to blow off steam after a long day at work. After all, home is where the harem is.

name: Knightward
summary: Construct automated defenses and brave treacherous dungeons in this action-packed roguelike. Invite up to 3 friends as you defend a crystal from endless waves of enemies and collect powerful items. Can you outlast the competition in this tower defense dungeon-crawling hybrid?

name: Knights of the Fall
summary: Knights of the Fall is a tactical sci-fi platformer that tells the story of a surviving astronaut Haru Kobayashi and his colleagues, as they fight off a hostile alien invasion with gravity and time bending technology.

name: Knight Cats: Leaves on the Road - Collector's Edition
summary: Chaos takes hold when an unknown villain executes an evil plan in the small village of Catstown, and young Shavan gets caught up in the mystery only to find that he may be his beloved town's only hope!

name: Knights of Takhisis Bundle Pack
summary: The Knights of Takhisis Bundle Pack includes three Skin & Feat packs that feature Arkhan, Krull, and Torogar, the Dark Order, as if they had sworn fielty to Takhisis instead of Tiamat! Collect these Krynn versions of the Dark Order characters today!

name: Knight Raider
summary: Knight Raider is a wave-based game set in a dungeon aesthetic environment. Kill enemies, purchase power-ups, and don't die! How fast can you beat it?

name: Knights of Pen & Paper 3
summary: Enter the new and improved world of chivalry, class warfare and off-beat pop references. Knights of Pen & Paper 3 is a true sequel to the turn-based, retro style, pixel-art adventure full of danger and saving throws you hold so dear!

name: Knight of the Living Dead
summary: Camelot is being overrun by zombie knights, and only the brave Sir Galahad can hold them back and restore peace to the kingdom. Knight of the Living Dead is an action-packed arena slasher with constant waves of the undead that need to be slayed quickly.

name: Knock 'Em Downs
summary: Knock 'Em Downs is a built in-game in the Glucoboy peripheral for the GBA.

name: Knights of the Road
summary: An adventure game with focus on acrobatics and discovering secrets. Classic platformer gameplay in the spirit of the 8-bit era games.

name: Knights and Goblins
summary: Knights and Goblins is a deck building card game. Build and play your deck against the computer. Win challenging opponents, get new cards to improve your deck, and design your own unique card. Will you manage to win all rounds and be the new champion?

name: Knightly Routine
summary: Knightly Routine is a wave-based fantasy survival game. Build castles, craft weapons, and trade with merchants during the day to protect yourself and your king from the endlessly growing waves of Night Pandas. Because they really don't like you.

name: Knock the Bloody Door Down
summary: It's hard to be a human in a world of vampires, isn't it? Explore an underground society, uncover its secrets, and make friends along the way. What awaits you on the path ahead - adventure? Or merely more heartache?

name: Knockout 2: Wrath of the Karen
summary:
In Knockout 2: Wrath of the Karen, a puzzle-boxing spectacle fighting game, take the role of an FBI agent (the bureau of Federal Boxing Investigations) tasked with uncovering the sinister secret behind a rise in wanton entitled law-breaking worldwide.

Knockout 2 pits you against the worst of society and the only way out is with your fists. The cable company stops giving you the discounted rate? That's a boxing match. Someone yields at an empty roundabout? That's a boxing match, too. In fact, all laws, court cases, and skimping out on sandwich toppings are resolved through combat in a world where the legal system has been replaced with boxing. The road to victory might not be easy, but it will be hilarious.

name: Knowledge Fever
summary: Knowledge Fever is a quiz game where you are a guy wanting to learn more about everything in the biggest library in the world! But this library holds some nasty secrets only those inside know. . . are you ready to enter there?

name: Knight, Death and the Devil
summary: Knight, Death and the Devil — This is a dark visual novel that will take you into a creepy world full of danger and unexpected twists.

name: Knight Hero Adventure idle RPG
summary: The world of magic and heroes, in the genre of rpg and roguelike games, needs a sword and bow master to protect it. Brave knight, an ancient evil has attacked the kingdom! The fate of the kingdom is now in your hands, assassin!

name: Knight Dungeons
summary: Ready to become a hero? Knight Dungeons is the perfect choice for any aspiring knight! Play through this intense action platformer and battle your way through a kingdom of enemies! With stunning graphics, challenging levels, and exciting boss battles, Knight Dungeons will keep you entertained for hours. Show off your skills and become the ultimate hero today! Knight Dungeons games are known for their tight controls and polish, and this game takes it to the next level.

name: Knight Trail
summary: A silly little micro RPG. You are Sir Knight, trying to save the kingdom without dying from general incompetence. You're free to explore the expansive world any way you'd like, but beware of what you might encounter.

name: Knock & Run
summary: Grab an orb and prepare to fight - It's about to go down. Compete your friends and knock down everyone!

name: Knights of the Throne
summary: Lasha is the leader of the Knights, a young woman of honor and strength. Deadly with a blade and pure in her heart, she will volunteer to take on a perilous path to protect the kingdom from an army of enemies never seen before.

name: Knightmares
summary: Face yourself in an epic tale of honor, courage and fusions. Knightmares will make you see fantasy from... A different point of view.

name: Knight vs Giant: The Broken Excalibur
summary: Engage in combat against gigantic monsters terrorising the Kingdom of Camelot and defeat them with your Broken Excalibur in this roguelite action adventure with RPG elements.

name: Knight Foretold
summary: As a young blacksmith forging armour for the Kingdom, you meet a Stranger in the wilderness that commissions you for a dangerous quest. Through Him your armour receives special blessings, enhancing your combat abilities, and leading you down the path of an old prophecy.

name: Knight Overloaded
summary: Night Overloaded is a roguelight survival game that reinforced strategic choices. Beat enemies falling from the sky endlessly, and expand your inventory!

name: Knights Within
summary: Knights Within is a 1-4 player hack&slash horde shooter with roguelite elements. Design custom loadouts, navigate procedurally generated levels and utilize random power-ups. Can you survive endless waves of enemies to ensure humanity's survival?

name: Knight Girl: Match 3 Puzzle
summary:
The Knight Girl is a match-3 puzzle game from the developers of popular Tap the Frog series.
On your way, you will meet colorful characters that will share with you their secrets of happiness. Various game bonuses and features allow for a fresh look at the classic match-3 gameplay.

name: Knit-Wit
summary: Knit-Wit is a push block puzzle game in the style of Nintendo's Game Boy Color. Puzzle your way through fifteen levels as you find enough wool to knit each of your family members a warm jumper and stave off the winter chills.

name: Knights of Braveland: Fantastic Beasts
summary: The Fantastic Beasts Expansion augments Knights of Braveland with a number of fearsome new bosses. In addition, you will now be able to play as a new hero, the mighty Wizard, who can defeat fantastic beasts with hunter's gear.

name: Know What I Meme
summary: Know What I Meme is a social party game of GIFs, memes, and good times! Select a text setup for the meme, browse to find the perfect GIF response, then everyone votes on which was their favorite. Earn points to prove just how funny you are. Up to 9 players can play but anyone can watch the fun!

name: Knights & Guns: Silver Edition
summary:
Knights & Guns: Silver Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game and Armor Pack #2 which adds 2 majestic armors, epitomizing grandeur and strength.

A classic revenge story set in a medieval fantasy world… with a touch of deadly modern firepower just to turn things up to eleven. Fight through the armies of undead, mutants, aliens, machines and beasts in order to get back what is rightfully yours and bring some semblance of peace back to the land. Who knows - if you’re thorough enough you might even discover the history of the kingdom itself, long lost to the scholars of the realm.

name: Knights of Braveland: Around the World Pack
summary: Around the World Pack offers you a whole bunch of in-game items from all over the world. Most of the new equipment will be available in the first locations, so you will encounter interesting combinations from the very beginning.

name: KnightMan
summary: Knight Man is a 2d Pixel-art retro style platformer. Play As Knightman, a heroic warrior who has taken it upon himself to save the 5 realms from the clutches of evil. Traverse through 20 hand-crafted levels across 5 unique zones, each populated by a variety of enemies and hazards.

name: Knights & Guns: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Knights & Guns: Deluxe Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game and Armor Pack #1 which adds 2 robust armors, expertly crafted to endure the toughest battles.

Knights & Guns brings you to a dangerous world where you will fight, alongside your friend, against demons, ghouls & ghosts. Use shotguns, lasers and the power of chivalry to overcome every obstacle. Become the best version of a knight - one with a gun.

name: Knockout Master
summary: Knockout Master is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel that puts you in the role of a boxer, whose dream is to become the world's heavyweight champion. The game is packed with sex, romance, drama, and a rich story.

name: Knightmare Gold
summary: A fanmade remake of Konami's legendary Konami game Knightmare.

name: Knee-Deep in Kdizd
summary:
Welcome back to 2008, everyone! Knee-Deep in Kdizd is here, appearing courtesy of The History Channel. That’s right, it’s 2007’s Knee-Deep in ZDoom, now upgraded for vanilla Doom2.exe.

If you’re not familiar with the original Kdizd, that’s okay! (After all, it has been… wow, 15 years?) You can think of Kdikdizd as a Doom E1 remake with larger maps and a combined focus on atmosphere, exploration, and tougher combat. Kdikdizd is also packed full of weird mapping tricks and some really dumb joke﻿s.

name: Knockout Peoples: Chotto Zankoku na Hakurankai
summary: A simple, choose your own adventure title, where players try to keep an ill-mannered pig from being brutally murdered by other animals.

name: Knight Cats: Leaves on the Road
summary: Welcome to Catstown, a scenic village with beautiful views, quaint cobblestone pathways, and stunning architecture!

name: Knighty Knight
summary:
Start playing Knighty Knight - A cute and heartfelt epic-adventure puzzle game!
Once upon a time, A Valiant Knight dreamed of going on an adventure to rescue his Beloved Princess from the Evil King!
Escape Enemy Pieces and Traps, use Items and Strategies to solve more than 30 levels of unique Chess Board Puzzles! Enjoy Side Quests for more rewards! Unlock super cute outfits for your Valiant Knight!

name: Knee-deep in 2023
summary: Classic E1 replacement

name: Knightess
summary: Anastasia, Artemisia & Lozen, three mercenaries who roam the Kingdom' looking for work, are seen by the King as the possible solution to keep the peace, even if only temporally. Join the three of them, as they journey in what will become a path of discovery, friendship and betrayal.

name: Knights & Guns: Back To School Edition
summary:
Knights & Guns: Back To School Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game, Expansion Pack #1, Expansion Pack #2 and Armor Pack #2 for a total of 20 new levels, 12 new armors and new enemies from both expansions.

A classic revenge story set in a medieval fantasy world… with a touch of deadly modern firepower just to turn things up to eleven. Fight through the armies of undead, mutants, aliens, machines and beasts in order to get back what is rightfully yours and bring some semblance of peace back to the land. Who knows - if you’re thorough enough you might even discover the history of the kingdom itself, long lost to the scholars of the realm.

name: Knight Without Sword
summary: A strategy and tactics game, you will play the role of an apprentice knight, use your wisdom to kill enemies without using any attack means, get gold coins, and reach the end point, in addition, don't forget to bring your chicken, it is your important partner !

name: Knock Out Walls
summary: Reign supreme in a world of walls and spells. Discover powerful strategies and outsmart your rivals with cunning tactics to rise through the ranks and become the one true Wallstar!

name: Knuckles the Echidna in Sonic the Hedgehog
summary:
Knuckles the Echidna in Sonic the Hedgehog was a planned add-on for Sonic the Hedgehog which allowed you to play as Knuckles by attaching the cartridge to Sonic & Knuckles. The game was only previewed once in volume 44 of SEGA Megazone.

The game was later replaced by Blue Sphere in the final release of Sonic & Knuckles.

name: Knight Speed
summary: Embark on an epic medieval adventure in this fast-paced endless runner. As a valiant knight, leap across perilous towers, skillfully shoot down enemies with your trusty bow, and protect your kingdom while racing against the relentless passage of time.

name: KnockedDown
summary: Race as a cop, take down criminals in this thrilling low-poly game. Fast action, challenging obstacles. Join the chase!

name: Knights of Grayfang
summary:
The land of Eldraad is in the midst of a war between the humans, born from the Twilight Deity, and the monsters, born from the Nightfall Deity, to control all nine temples. King Edwahl wields twilight's might, turning humans into vampires via a ritual. Yet, a sinister force awakens among monsters. Will nightfall or twilight triumph?
One of the main characters, Thoma, wields a unique Blood Gauge, replacing HP and MP. Using this gauge, characters can activate Bloodthirst, granting new skills and appearances. Equip bats found in dungeons for passive effects like protection from ailments and boosted attack power. Seize victory by claiming all nine temples. Unravel the mysteries and battle the monsters within to conquer them!

name: Knights & Guns: Armor Pack #1
summary: Brace yourself for "Armor Pack #1" for Knights and Guns. Stand tall against your adversaries with two robust armors, expertly crafted to endure the toughest battles. Transform your knight into an indestructible guardian of justice with this stellar upgrade!

name: Knights & Guns: Armor Pack #2
summary: Let your knight shine on the battlefield with Knights and Guns' "Armor Pack #2". This DLC offers two majestic armors, epitomizing grandeur and strength. Make a move, show courage, and astound your enemies!

name: Knights & Guns: Gold Edition
summary: This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #1 and Armor Pack #1.

name: Knights & Guns: Prime Edition
summary:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2 and Armor Pack #1 with:
- 10 new levels for you to bring back the peace
- 7 new armors to help you on your quest
- New enemies for that extra little kick

name: Know Your Limits
summary: Know Your Limits is a speed run game with speed limits. You can increase your speed by collecting coins, but it wouldn't be always the best choice. Go through all the obstacles and get your highest score!

name: Know
summary: "Know" is a cute, eerie, and slightly melancholic adventure game. Explore, evade "Kaiubutsu" (monsters), and uncover the secrets of this world!

name: Knightess in Debt
summary: Build your own deck and battle, as you gamble your way to freedom and love.

name: Knowledge Party
summary: Quiz game for 2-10 players. Play together and find out who is true Winner!

name: Knight Case Files
summary: Tradition becomes fact, and historical fact becomes a lie... The setting is a 19th century-style otherworld, the Kingdom of the Phoenix. It was a fairy tale that the dead would come back to life. Except for those who know the truth.

name: Knight in the Maze
summary: This is a story-driven Roguelike game. Four knights, while investigating anomalies within the labyrinth, accidentally became trapped inside a sealed maze. They need to work together to navigate the labyrinth, discover the cause of the anomalies, and simultaneously find a way to escape.

name: Knight Versus Demon
summary: In Knight Versus Demon a VR player controls a villainous demon battling against a tiny stoic hero played by a local friend on the PC.

name: KnifePlayground: Horror Battle Royale
summary: Multiplayer Survival Horror: 4 Players Co-op or Solo Battle Royale. Players have to cooperate or kill each other in a 3 floors mansion full of monsters which every floor closes after a deadly countdown. Shoot, stab, hide, upgrade and get stronger after every death by unpredictable Roguelite elements

name: Knight's Path: The Tournament
summary: Knight's Path: The Tournament is a short medieval RPG featuring challenging combat, an immersive progression system, and a nice little story.

name: Knuckleheads
summary: Play as two connected angry heads in this unique action game.

name: Knight Party
summary: As a lord on the continent of Oren, lead your knights on various adventures!!

name: Knights of the Rogue Dungeon
summary: Cleanse the Rogue Dungeon of three Demon Knights as you battle through the depths in this addicting rogue-like dungeon hopper from the creators of Mutant Mudds and Xeodrifter.

name: Knights of Fresco
summary: Raise your own band of Knights and fight beasts from medieval paintings. Knights of Fresco is an open world party building RPG with auto-battling combat that tries to emulate medieval depictions of battles and wars.

name: Knights of Braveland: Fun And Memes
Knights of Braveland: Ultimate Edition
summary: Epic adventures & co-op battles in a Braveland universe

name: Knight of Valour 3 HD
summary: Knights of Valour 3 HD is a remaster solely designed to showcase the custom Polygame Master 3 (PGM3) arcade engine. It was published for PC by Tencent on 2014 exclusively for the Chinese market.

name: Knight's Empire
summary: Play Knight the knight in a rogue-defense game, involving tower defense and rogue-like mechanics. Defend your kingdom from tons of goblins and slayers.

name: Knight's Saga Evil Goblins
summary: Knight's Saga: Evil Goblins is an exciting fantasy game where the world has been invaded by evil goblins and you take on the role of a brave warrior on a dangerous journey to destroy them. Exciting adventures and battles await you in the name of saving the kingdom.

name: Knowledge, or Know Lady
summary: You, the "sole male student" at a women's university, are about to embark on a sweet and laughter-filled campus love journey from a first-person perspective! How will you resist the temptations of the beauties and create your own legend in this girls' school?

name: Kneedle Knight
summary: Kneedle Knight is a 3rd-person puzzle platformer game. Conjure fabric with a magic needle as Sir Lukoss the Small and merge in and out of fabric. Solve puzzles, platform across magical objects, and defeat cursed candle minions to return Sir Lukoss to normal and defeat the Witch of Fabric!

name: Knightborn
summary: Be a Warrior, Mage, Archer, or Priest and rise as Knightborn! Explore a hand-painted world, loot enemies, and adventure with friends. Reconnect with classic RPG magic!

name: Knightmare Tales
summary: Knightmare Tales is a Third-Person-Action-Adventure in a nightmarish setting. Find your confidence and be yourself, in this emotional action adventure! Knightmare Tales is a classic Action-Adventure, focuses on combat and atmosphere with a captivating story, kind of a 'soulslike with a twist'.

name: Knights in Tight Spaces
summary: Control your environment, gather your party, and build your best deck to overcome outlaws and supernatural forces, across a rich fantasy world. Watch as your tactical choices and deckbuilding prowess play out through stylish fight sequences.

name: Knowledge Keeper
summary: In this game, you will become a keeper of knowledge, collecting shards of divine crystals. Look for the right way to crystals. Avoid dangerous obstacles. Teleport from one space to another to get closer to your goal.

name: Knight Island
summary: Tile-based strategy with the best aspects of roguelike deck builders. On top of that, unique mechanics that allow you to shape your island as you wish. Knight Island is a game that blends these features you'll love in this genre and immerses you in unique battles.

name: Knight of Nevermore
summary: Knight of Nevermore is a roguelike action-platformer featuring tight combat and diverse builds. Fight skillfully, platform carefully and equip yourself wisely if you plan to overcome the challenges of Nevermore.

name: Knuffi
summary: Explore digital world with a cute cat-girl named "Knuffi" in this 2D pixelart platformer. Navigate through a variety of levels, each offering unique challenges. An adorable adventure awaits!

name: Knockout City: Private Server Edition
summary: Team up and duke it out with rival Crews in Knockout City, where epic dodgeball battles settle the score in team-based multiplayer matches. Throw, catch, pass, dodge, and tackle your way to dodgeball dominance!

name: Knight's Drop
summary: There's only one Knight on the board. Move and the tile you were standing on disappears which leaves the next player with less possible moves.

name: Knights & Dragons: The Endless Quest
summary:
The land is vast and the maps are blank. For the brave and bold, every new path could lead to untold riches... or a gruesome death.

Choose one of five adventuring classes and embark on an open world journey. Gather treasure and build experience to become ever more powerful. You're going to need all the strength you can muster for the battles ahead.

Finish the task and you'll discover all new heroes and tests to enjoy. Grab two of your friends to come along for a three player throw down. The quest is truly endless!

name: Knight's Redemption: War for Freedom
summary: Unite, Fight, Liberate: Write Your Legend in the Battle for Freedom!

name: Knights of Romance and Valor
summary: Caught between boring lectures and relentless bullies, a book on the legends of Camelot and its famous knights has been a welcome source of refuge. When an unknown force spirits you away to King Arthur’s court, that escape suddenly becomes a lot more real — if you can believe it!

name: Knights Combo
summary: Knights Combo is a strategic mobile game that combines puzzle-matching, card RPG, and roguelike elements! Rally your heroes and embark on an epic journey! Link scattered elemental blocks on the board by connecting and unleashing skills! Deliver a devastating strike to the enemy with random roguelike skills.

name: Knight Sim Life
summary: "Knight Sim Life" offers a compelling blend of city-building, farming simulation, and strategic combat.

name: Knights Vault
summary: Knights Vault is simply a multiplayer Souls Like Platformer. Run, jump and dodge roll your way through many environments and obstacles while fighting other players in your lobby, only one knight will stand victorious vaulting their way to the grand treasure!

name: Knowledge Domination
summary: Knowledge Domination is a multiplayer knowledge and strategy game. Players attempt to conquer each other's territories by answering questions correctly. Gain special powers by rolling dice and catch your opponents off guard . If you lose your capital ️, you lose the game.

name: Knights and Magic Bundle
summary:
"This bundle includes:

Chronicles of Magic: Divided Kingdom
Queen's Quest: Stories of Forgotten Past
King's Heir: Rise to the Throne"

name: Knights of the Round Peg
summary: Journey through Knights of the Round Peg's magical world with a brave lute-playing knight as you overcome peg obstacles!

name: Knight Runner: Blade and Bolt
summary: Fight your way through an endless forest, slaying monsters, dodging traps, and chasing the highest score possible in this simple yet addictive pixel art runner.

name: Knoblins
summary: Knoblins is a delightful little toy that lets you hatch musical creatures and perform songs for an ever-growing audience. Knoblins is designed to be very approachable and easy for anyone to pickup and play, whether you are musically inclined or not!

name: Knight Lolita
summary: An extremely lethal combat system with manual sword control emphasizes the decision to avoid enemies or slaughter even bosses in an instant in wide levels full of roaming monsters. The finished game will feature flight and more vertical exploration.

name: Knight Fall
summary: Welcome to Knight Fall, where every move is a challenge! Battle bosses as you climb through dangerous lands. Be careful; a single wrong move could mean the end of the journey. Will you beat the horrors or fall to the bosses on your daring quest?

name: Knock
summary: "Knock is a Clicker game that challenges you to accumulate points by tapping on the lid of your coffin. Get ready to immerse yourself in the eerie yet captivating world of Knock!"

name: Knyaz' Vladimir
summary: Knyaz' Vladimir is an action platformer for Windows based on the cartoon of the same name, developed by PiPE Studio and published by 1C on May 5, 2006.

name: Knight Guy in Low Res World: Castle Days
summary: Knight Guy in Low Res World: Castle Days is a platformer with some metroidvania elements. Knight Guy's pet (either a dog or a cat) has been kidnapped by an evil dragon, and he has to explore a castle with 100 rooms in order to find and rescue his pet. He must do this within a one hour time limit, all while dealing with the evil dragon and his minions.

name: Knight Lore
summary: This version of the game extensively modifies the graphics and sounds. It is the only version of the game that has color graphics. While the original game took place in a dungeon, this version takes place in a forest.

name: Knightly Gnomes
summary: Knightly Gnomes is a Top-Down Strategy game where you choose to play as either the leader of the Knights or Gnomes and control troops in order to fight the enemy faction.

name: Knee Deep in the UnDead
summary: Designed to recreate the feel of Knee Deep in the Dead as a short and simple E1 replacement.

name: KnightLight
summary: A 2D puzzle-platformer where you light your way through the darkness. Play as the Light, exploring an abandoned civilization where you find a suit of armor that seems to have magical properties. Suit up using the powers of the suit to channel your light magic to see what this strange place hides.

name: Knighttron
summary: The hero wakes up in a world of infected dark magic and cannot remember anything, including his own name. Guide the hero in his journey to recover his memories while battling through hordes of aggressive enemies. Fight, trade, loot and complete quests to enlist the support of new allies. Who knows what secrets lay hidden in this world? Enjoy hours of exciting gameplay in this curious world of both might & magic. Control parties of up to three characters in this turn-based strategy adventure!

name: Knuckles Quest
summary: Knuckles Quest is a continuation of the treasure hunting gameplay style that was present in Sonic Adventure and Sonic Adventure 2, now with a custom framework and levels. Using a radar, search the area for all the emerald pieces, but be careful: the locations are randomly selected!

name: Knight George
summary: Knight George is a top-down retro-style A-RPG. Travel across the Kingdom of Earlyne to meet friendly characters, explore numerous dungeons and fight terrifying monsters to save the kingdom!

name: Knight Legacy
summary: A new journey across the Kingdom Of Kavasia awaits you in Knight Legacy! Become a true knight, fight against evil foes and help people with many side quests.

name: Knight Of The Earthends
summary: A dynamic fantasy RPG, featuring an adventure around the ends of the earth. Enjoy the stirring energy of the battles and the quest.

name: Knightfall Showdown
summary: Step into the ultimate chess rumble! In Knightfall Showdown, 100 players face off on a massive board, upgrading pieces and outsmarting opponents in intense elimination rounds. Strategize, rise through the ranks, and become the last piece standing!

name: Knight-Blade: Howling of Kerberos
summary: In 2077, after World War IV, Cain Graywood, betrayed by the Elite and having his friends killed, enters their headquarters for revenge. What awaited him was the strongest armored forces, with the forbidden super weapon "EX-ARMS".

name: Knock Off: The Battle for Imagination
Knight's Night!
summary: Knight's Night! is a retro-style 1-bit platformer. Collect items, unlock new abilities, and make your way into the evil wizard's castle to save the kingdom!

name: Knight Hero 2 Revenge idle RPG
summary:
Unleash non-stop battle in this 2D idle RPG adventure.

Knight Hero 2 Revenge offers a compelling fusion of role-playing and automated platforming in an incredibly addictive adventure game!

name: Known Mysteries
summary: Known Mysteries is the first game made for Solar Server. It is about the desire to escape Earth. Using a mix of video and text, Sorrow's story unfolds with the help of the player to solve the mysteries in her town.

name: Knightica
summary: Recruit powerful units, place them strategically and find the best synergies in this Roguelike Autobattler! Knightica lets you guide a warband through many challenges to free the Kingdoms. Discover optimal combinations, weave powerful enchants, face dangerous monsters and lead your army to victory!

name: Knights of the Crusades
summary: Travel to the Holy Land with the First Crusades. Rise from a humble knight to the founding father of a world-spanning holy order. Lead through war, faith, diplomacy, and cunning schemes. Experience a unique blend of RTS, city-building, and sandbox gameplay, and shape history!

name: Knockoff
summary: KNOCKOFF is an upcoming Iso-fighter RPG, set in a Lovecraftian mall taken over by various gangs. Featuring a blend of RPG decision making and fighting game combat, KNOCKOFF is like nothing you've ever seen.

name: Knock on the Window
summary: Martin has been given an urgent assignment at work. However, for this he had to go to the house of his Boss. And so Martin found himself alone at home, in the middle of a vast field of sunflowers. Everything was going well until there was a knock on the window.

name: Knight Light
summary: Terrifying nightmares manifest, attempting to shatter the Witchball—a mystical barrier safeguarding the sleeping residents. As a courageous deity, battle through relentless waves of nightmarish creatures, protecting the town from falling into eternal darkness. Save their dreams before it’s too late!

name: Knuckle Jet
summary: What's this? An off-the-wall, riveting jetpunk nose-breaking ricochet action platformer, lovingly crafted by the oddballs behind the Teslagrad series?

name: Knight Cats: Whisper of the Universe
Knight Cats: Waves on the Water - Collector's Edition
knockout! Archetype: False
summary:
Experience fast-paced action with hand-drawn animation and a wide variety of characters from this game and the Hyun's Dojo community.

Archetype False is a more over-the-top take on Knockout, largely drawing inspiration from the Guilty Gear series, Melty Blood, and an assortment of mid-2000s doujin fighters. Enjoy the game now with rollback netcode, new menu options, in-game movelists, a robust training mode, and more.

name: Knight's Pride
summary: This game isn`t rich story-wise! It plays almost as much as Knights and Dungeons another game of mines.... This is also not an Idle game and battles aren`t automated. This game is about actively doing repeatable tasks to unlock new content such as new gear and new enemies.

name: Knockturne
summary: KNOCKturne is an RPG game that tells the story of the protagonist's adventure to free a boss with many emotions in his dreams and escape from there.

name: Knuckle Knockout
summary: An action-packed 2D platformer fighting game for 2-4 players. Brawl with friends across three unique maps with the first player to win three rounds taking the crown!

name: Knight Cats: Whisper of the Universe - Collector's Edition
Know How
summary:
Know How is a classic puzzle game. The objective is to move a treasure chest off the game board an onto an exit square. Various stones block the way and have to be moved first, but they will only move lengthwise. Special obstacles like springs, magnets and magically linked stones further complicate the task.

The game contains 350 puzzles, a 'free play' and a story mode. The free play mode is simply a linear sequence of puzzles. In story mode, the main character Valerie is stranded on a mysterious island, trying to escape and to discover the secret of the ancient civilization that once lived there. The player must navigate her across a map of the island and solve puzzles along the way.

name: Knight's Tail: Tactics
summary: Prototype Procedural Tactical RPG

name: Knights of Neon
summary:
Knights of Neon is an action packed Hack n' Slash with RPG elements set in the retro realm of Cyberspace.

Prepare to immerse yourself in a thrilling fusion of medieval valor and futuristic cyber-warfare with "Knights of Neon," the ultimate VR combat experience.

name: Knights of Puzzelot
summary: Go on an epic fantasy adventure – one puzzle at a time! Play a puzzle to battle monsters, find treasure, and collect items for your hero. Help rebuild the Kingdom of Puzzelot, and defend it from dragons and other legendary beasts!

name: Knight Lobster
summary: YOU WILL LOSE EVERYTHING. YOU WILL GAIN EVERYTHING. THIS WORLD WILL REACH PEACE, AT ANY COST. YOU MUST REACH THE TOP. YOU MUST REACH THE TOP. THIS WORLD WILL REACH PEACE, AT ANY COST. YOU MUST REACH THE TOP. YOU MUST REACH THE TOP. THIS WORLD WILL REACH PEACE, AT ANY COST. YOU MUST REACH THE TOP.

name: Knob
summary: Dive into an exciting 3D platforming adventure! Overcome tricky obstacles, solve creative puzzles, and defeat mechanical enemies. Master the unique movement of your ball-shaped hero and discover a world full of surprises

name: Knight of the Dungeon
summary: A fast-paced 2D Rogue-Like game with Bullet-Hell elements and procedural level generation.

name: Knowmad
summary: Build your base, earn passive income, and survive each night. Strategize your way off the planet in this cozy-but-challenging game.

name: Knight On The Moon
summary: This is a top down adventure game involving exploration, delving into dungeons, solving puzzles, and engaging in combat with various enemies. Players control a protagonist who must gather items, such as weapons, tools, and upgrades, to progress through increasingly challenging areas. Exploration and discovery are key, as players uncover hidden secrets, navigate mazes, and complete objectives to advance the story. This game is a balance of action, problem-solving.

name: Knight Quest: Goblins Raid
summary: An epic adventure that will test your courage

name: Know That Flag!
summary: Challenge your global knowledge with Know That Flag!, the ultimate flag quiz game offering five unique modes – from guessing countries by their currency to identifying flags by their capital cities.

name: Knight vs. Monsters
summary: Fight as a fearless knight against endless waves of monsters. Use your sword, collect power-ups, and survive the onslaught. Boost your health and speed to stay alive in this fast-paced, wave-based action game.

name: Knighventure
summary: The eternal darkness of the dungeons dragged the brave knight in golden armor into an endless maze of dangers

name: Knight in Time
summary: In this bullet hell odyssey, Claymore, the time travelling knight, must save the world with his limited understanding of how guns work. He must uncover the mystery of the future. You will uncover the truth of it all. We eagerly await your response.

name: Knight Crawler
summary: Play as Cyrus, a medieval knight, in this top-down action roguelike. Battle your way through endless procedurally generated dungeons filled with coins and weapons. Discover rare, powerful modifiers and test your skills against a variety of deadly foes.

name: Knight Jump
summary: A 3D Precision Platformer, but with the time limit of 60 minutes! Master precise jumps and don't lose too much time while reaching the princess! Traverse through 7 levels, enable shortcuts and make the best out of the 60 minutes!

name: Knight's Dungeon
summary: Knight's Dungeon is a puzzle game where you must solve word, number, color, push-block, and music puzzles to advance through the dungeon. You use an in-game journal to automatically record information as you find it. Also features a handful of expansive side-games separate from the original campaign, such as a hilltop mansion mystery or an ocean adventure complete with a health and game-over system.

name: Knightmare II: The Maze of Galious
[K]night City
summary: Parry your way through Old York with Sir William!

name: Knight Brawler
summary: Inspired by the masterpieces of the past, Knight Brawler is a nostalgic 2D platformer that combines thrilling action with vintage game play.

name: Knight of Justice
summary: A fantasy action game featuring real-time combat, party building, exploration, and strategic tower defense as you rise from outsider to hero in a world besieged by demons.

name: Knights Shadow
summary: An ancient knight searches for magical orbs while being pursued by shadow versions of himself.

name: Knights of Messiah If: Castle in an Alternate Dimension
summary: Enjoy traveling around the beautiful world of Knights of Messiah as the leader of a party of adventurers! When Alicia and Maya are captured by the evil prince of Windsor, Ritz, you and your friends must explore dungeons in search of the Gemstones that'll allow you to access his castle!

name: Knight's Errand
summary: Gather your army. Defeat other players' avatars. Claim the champion's title. Knight's Errand is a concentrated dose of tactical nostalgia, designed for quick and intense sessions. Pure tactics, no filler.

name: Knightoban
summary: Knightoban is a fantasy-themed puzzle game where a brave knight ventures into a dungeon filled with deadly traps and ancient secrets. Your goal is to clear the path and collect all the treasures to complete each level. By pushing blocks, sealing acid holes, and unlocking gates, you’ll create a safe route for the knight to reach every treasure.

name: Knights & Towers
summary: Create strategies, evolve and defende the castle!

name: Knock on the Occult Door
summary: Bind spirits. Weigh their pain. Each client arrives by appointment haunted, broken, or dangerous. In this gothic occult visual novel, you use protective accessories, read signs, and choose bindings that alter fate. Some seek redemption. Others hide darker truths. Your rituals may awaken the dead.

name: Knights in a Different Spacetime
summary: A Knight with a gun. Something's happened to time. Deadly robots invading. A twin-stick, action, top down shooter, with in depth gun customization, special abilities, and classic swords. Shoot your way through linear levels and secrets, and develop the ultimate guns and futuristic weapons.

name: Knightwatch
summary: By day - Build defenses and towers. By night - grab weapon of your choice and fight off relentless waves of zombies, undead, werewolves and other monsters. In a FPS x Tower Defense game where you defend a winter town overshadowed by the King’s castle.

name: Knights of Fiona
summary: Fierce dragons have emerged in the land of Gallia. Join Fiona and her sworn knights to protect the kingdom! Embark on quests solo or with friends as you fight against the darkness.

name: Knight´s Quest
summary: Embark on a heroic journey in Knight's Quest, a 2D platformer set in a world consumed by darkness. Play as a valiant knight determined to reclaim ancient ruins and defeat monstrous foes.

name: Knight of the Keep
summary: Knight of the Keep is a retro-style 2D action platformer where you play as Sir Peter, the last knight defending Castle Keep from waves of corrupted foes. With only his skill, timing, and courage, he must clear each room to unlock the gates and move forward. Dodge traps, fight monsters, and survive a collapsing world. With crisp pixel art and tight controls, it's a brutal, no-shortcuts challenge. Can one knight protect the last gate to the light?

name: Knights College 2
summary: KnightsCollege 2 is a kemono visual novel set in the Knight College, where elite knight candidates live. In this game, every choice is presented as a card, and the protagonist lives in the dormitory while collecting cards.

name: Knife Man
summary:
Its 90's, and your dad bought you VHS camcorder.

Bunch of your friends got so excited, so they came up with wonderful slasher movie script, and you are gonna record it.

name: Knock on the Coffin Lid: Nightmares of Millenis
summary: A continuation of Knock on the Coffin Lid's story, after the game's finale.Will you manage to pass all of Millenis’ tests and find the one right decision that will allow you to stop the war in the lands of Midian?

name: Knight's Path
summary: Step into a story-driven action RPG set in a grounded low-fantasy world inspired by the Holy Roman Empire. Rise from a nobody to a respected knight through hard-earned, immersive progression. Master HEMA-inspired combat and explore forests, villages, castles, and the living town of Eranthold!

name: Knight Castle Defender
summary: Defend your castle across 100 thrilling levels! Command unique warriors, use powerful abilities, and stop the orcs.
